description:
The mystery of Sanji`s disappearance deepens as Luffy learns that Big Mom`s lackeys have caught up with him and the rest - and carry with them an invitation from Big Mom that simply can`t be refused!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Wahrheit über Sanjis Verschwinden – Eine unerwartete Einladung
La vérité derrière la disparition. Sanji reçoit une invitation surprenante
Shissou no Shinjitsu: Sanji Kyougaku no Shoutaijou
The Truth Behind the Disappearance! Sanji Gets a Startling Invitation!
Правда об исчезновении! Шокирующее приглашение для Санджи!
الحقيقة خلف الاختفاء! يتلقّى سانجي دعوةً مفزعة!
失踪の真実 サンジ驚愕の招待状
